name: The Missile Human (clone)
description:
Controls:

PlayerMoveShootP1ESDFAP2Arrow KeysM

Objective: Steer your missile into your opponent to win the round. First to 5 rounds wins the game.

The Missile Human is a clone of Sum Soft's 1989 classic. It is relatively faithful, albeit at a different aspect ratio and resolution.

Class: Pixel Prototype

Assignment: Clone an old game

Postmortem: Not incredibly valuable as a cultural object, since the good parts of this are just the good parts of the existing game. That said, I am reasonably happy with how it came out.
